rules_text: Exile the top twenty cards of each player’s library. For each player, choose three exiled cards they own and shuffle them into their library.
notes:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rjcIpOIvVyg

Flavortext_1:
Convenience you feel need, Excess that satisfies greed, Growth at all cost, Blind as to what you’ve lost.

OG_3:
Exile the top 15 cards of each player’s library. For each player, choose up to two exiled cards they own and shuffle them into their library.

OG_2:
Exile the top 15 cards of each player’s library. For each player, choose up to five exiled cards they own and shuffle them into their library.

OG_1:
At the beginning of each upkeep, that player loses half their life total, rounding up, then mills five cards and draws three cards.
